subject: Homosexuality and Bisexuality
Basketball
Advertising and Marketing
Transgender and Transsexual
lead_paragraph: Now that the coast is clear, the W.N.B.A., which has been around for nearly two decades, has decided to publicly embrace its gay fans. The gesture deserves two slow claps, considering how long it took.
